pages.title: Dreadfish
pages.text: This agressive skeletal fish spawns underground in cold biomes. It may look harmless but will give you a hard time if you were to encounter it. The Dreadfish drops a Soulfire, a magical colored spark that works great for decoration.

pages.name: Dreadfish
pages.text: Dreadfish can also be tamed with Prismarine Crystals, and dyed.
